description: A tall, curvaceous female demon covered in a brilliant layer of green fur (with gold streaks) over parts of her body that converges into a wild mane of prehensile hair which she uses as a weapon, attempting to ensnare or strike her enemy. She can also assume the molecular structure of other materials, such as wood or metal, and then manipulate them- such as to cause spikes to jut out from the surface.
name: Caroline
